item.title: How I Made This Blog
item.description: Plan of Attack When evaluating options for starting a blog I wanted something that was fast, free, and easy to setup CI / CD for. GitHub Pages ticks both the free and easy boxes but it can be a bit slow to respond. To solve the speed issue I stuck cloudflare in front of GitHub to leverage its CDN caching, ensuring that response times are fast. ┌ │ │ │ └ ┌ │ └ ─ ─ ─ ─ ─ d ─ ─ U ─ ─ y ─ ─ s ─ ─ l ─ ─ e ─ ─ G a ─ ─ r ─ ─ i n ─ ─ ─ ─ t r ─ ┐ ├ ┘ ─ H j ─ ─ ─ u o ─ ─ ─ b h ─ ─ ─ n ─ ─ ─ R s ─ ─ ─ e t ─ ┌ │ ► │ └ ─ p o ─ ─ ─ ─ o n ─ ─ C N ─ ─ s .
